> **Note**: Agentik is in early development. Many features are incomplete or not yet implemented. Please check that the feature you're reporting a bug for is actually implemented before submitting.

## Description

A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Run '...'
2. Enter '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.

## Environment

- OS: [e.g., macOS 14.0, Ubuntu 22.04]
- Rust version: [e.g., 1.75.0]
- Agentik version/commit: [e.g., commit abc123]

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here. Include relevant logs or error messages if available.

If you have ideas on how to fix this, please share them here.
